name: Meteority
description:
Just the same as the mobile free version but without ads !

You are living pacefully in the midle of space, but a meteor storm is comming, don't let them destroy your house.

  •  Easy to play, no tutorials required.
  • Simple and colorful art.
  • Guitar music

Key Features:

  • Endless game
  • Dynamic difficulty
  • Mouse and Keyboard
  • Gamepad compatibility
  • Achievements to unlock
  • Player stadistics
